text: In 1993, Otto Waalkes made "Friesenjung", in the song he talks about his home life. Ski Aggu and Joost Klein, used it as the sample for their song "Friesenjung". On May 25, 2023, this song was released as a single and claimed the #1 spot in the German and Austrian charts. == Charts == Charts of "Friesenjung" Chart top position Austria Top 75 1 Germany Top 100 1 Swiss Singles Top 100 7 Sweden Singles Top 100 100 == References == Category:1993 songs Category:2023 songs
title: Friesenjung
